head.supplied: Melbourne ¶ 5/3/76. ¶ ¶ One of the most interesting of the new plants of the last expedition, dear Mr Tietkens, I have named in honor of you. ¶ You collected many, so I know; but it is difficult for...

div.p: ML DOC 2105 Dover papers, Mitchell Library, State Library of New South Wales, Sydney.

One of the most interesting of the new plants of the last expedition, dear Mr Tietkens, I have named in honor of you.
Aotus tietkensii attributed by M in B76.03.01, p. 33, to Young and Tietkens as collectors at Victoria Spring, WA, during Ernest Giles's successful journey of exploration from the Overland Telegraph Line to Perth, WA. You collected many, so I know; but it is difficult for me to record the real finders. Perhaps you will be out some day yourself as an important explorer & collect then for yourself.
